titleStmt.title: Jeremias redivivus: or, An elegiacall lamentation on the death of our English Josias, Charles the First, King of Great Britaine, &c. publiquely murdered by his Calvino-Judaicall subjects.
titleStmt.author: Montagu, Walter, 1603?-1677.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "said to by [sic] written by Walter Moutacute"; "May. 30".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
